mapper.select: SELECT r.RST_NO, r.RST_NAME, s.RST_TBL, s.RST_SEAT FROM DELUNA.RESTAURANT r, DELUNA.SEATPLACE s WHERE r.RST_NO = s.RST_NO AND s.RST_NO=#{rstNo} GROUP BY r.RST_NO, r.RST_NAME, s.RST_SEAT, s.RST_TBL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEATPLACE(RST_NO, RST_TBL, RST_SEAT) VALUES(#{rstNo}, #{rstTbl}, #{rstSeat})
INSERT INTO MENU(MENU_NO, RST_NO, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_CNT, MENU_IMG) VALUES(#{menuNo}, #{rstNo}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuCnt}, #{menuImg})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MENU WHERE RST_NO=#{rstNo} ORDER BY MENU_NO ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MENU WHERE MENU_NO=#{menuNo} AND RST_NO=1
mapper.select: SELECT r.RST_NO, r.RST_NAME, r.RST_ADDR, r.RST_TEL, count(s.RST_TBL) AS tbl_count FROM DELUNA.RESTAURANT r, DELUNA.SEATPLACE s WHERE r.RST_NO = s.RST_NO AND r.RST_NO=#{rstNo} GROUP BY r.RST_NO, r.RST_NAME, r.RST_ADDR, r.RST_TEL
